statements: UPSERT INTO user_energy_data (id, user_id, energy_consumed, timestamp) VALUES (1, 101, 50.2, '2022-10-10 08:30:00')
UPSERT INTO energy_providers (provider_id, provider_name, location) VALUES (1, 'Provider A', 'Location A')
UPSERT INTO user_energy_data (id, user_id, energy_consumed, timestamp) VALUES (2, 102, 70.5, '2022-10-11 10:45:00')
UPSERT INTO energy_producers (id, name, location) VALUES (1, 'Solar Energy Inc.', 'California') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Solar Energy Inc.', location = 'California';
UPSERT INTO energy_consumers (id, name, location) VALUES (2, 'Green Power Co.', 'New York') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Green Power Co.', location = 'New York';

UPSERT INTO energy_production (id, producer_id, production_date, production_amount) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-10-20', 5000.0) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET producer_id = 1, production_date = '2022-10-20', production_amount = 5000.0;
UPSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name, city, country) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'New York', 'USA') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_name = 'John Doe', city = 'New York', country = 'USA'

UPSERT INTO supplies (supply_id, supply_name, description, unit_price, supplier_id) VALUES (1, 'Paper', 'A4 size paper', 1.5, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE supply_name = 'Paper', description = 'A4 size paper', unit_price = 1.5, supplier_id = 1

UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, category, price, supply_id) VALUES (1, 'Notebook', 'Stationery', 2.5, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_name = 'Notebook', category = 'Stationery', price = 2.5, supply_id = 1
UPSERT INTO EnergyCompany (company_id, company_name, industry) VALUES (1, 'ABC Energy', 'Renewable Energy')
UPSERT INTO EnergyCompany (company_id, company_name, industry) VALUES (2, 'XYZ Power', 'Electric Utility')
UPSERT INTO EnergyCompany (company_id, company_name, industry) VALUES (3, '123 Energy', 'Solar Power')
